fields.name: BurstingEnabled
fields.description: Set to true to enable bursting beyond the provisioned performance target of the disk. Bursting is disabled by default. Does not apply to Ultra disks.

fields.name: BurstingEnabledTime
fields.description: Latest time when bursting was last enabled on a disk.

fields.name: CompletionPercent
fields.description: Percentage complete for the background copy when a resource is created via the CopyStart operation.

fields.name: DiskAccessId
fields.description: ARM id of the DiskAccess resource for using private endpoints on disks.

fields.name: DiskIOPSReadOnly
fields.description: The total number of IOPS that will be allowed across all VMs mounting the shared disk as ReadOnly. One operation can transfer between 4k and 256k bytes.

fields.name: DiskIOPSReadWrite
fields.description: The number of IOPS allowed for this disk; only settable for UltraSSD disks. One operation can transfer between 4k and 256k bytes.

fields.name: DiskMBpsReadOnly
fields.description: The total throughput (MBps) that will be allowed across all VMs mounting the shared disk as ReadOnly. MBps means millions of bytes per second - MB here uses the ISO notation, of powers of 10.

fields.name: DiskMBpsReadWrite
fields.description: The bandwidth allowed for this disk; only settable for UltraSSD disks. MBps means millions of bytes per second - MB here uses the ISO notation, of powers of 10.

fields.name: DiskSizeBytes
fields.description: The size of the disk in bytes. This field is read only.

fields.name: DiskSizeGB
fields.description: If creationData.createOption is Empty, this field is mandatory and it indicates the size of the disk to create. If this field is present for updates or creation with other options, it indicates a resize. Resizes are only allowed if the disk is not attached to a running VM, and can only increase the disk's size.

fields.name: HyperVGeneration
fields.description: The hypervisor generation of the Virtual Machine. Applicable to OS disks only.

fields.name: LastOwnershipUpdateTime
fields.description: The UTC time when the ownership state of the disk was last changed i.e., the time the disk was last attached or detached from a VM or the time when the VM to which the disk was attached was deallocated or started.

fields.name: MaxShares
fields.description: The maximum number of VMs that can attach to the disk at the same time. Value greater than one indicates a disk that can be mounted on multiple VMs at the same time.

fields.name: OptimizedForFrequentAttach
fields.description: Setting this property to true improves reliability and performance of data disks that are frequently (more than 5 times a day) by detached from one virtual machine and attached to another. This property should not be set for disks that are not detached and attached frequently as it causes the disks to not align with the fault domain of the virtual machine.

fields.name: OsType
fields.description: The Operating System type.

fields.name: PropertyUpdatesInProgress
fields.description: Properties of the disk for which update is pending.

fields.name: ProvisioningState
fields.description: The disk provisioning state.

fields.name: ShareInfo
fields.description: Details of the list of all VMs that have the disk attached. maxShares should be set to a value greater than one for disks to allow attaching them to multiple VMs.

fields.name: SupportsHibernation
fields.description: Indicates the OS on a disk supports hibernation.

fields.name: Tier
fields.description: Performance tier of the disk (e.g, P4, S10) as described here: https://azure.microsoft.com/en-us/pricing/details/managed-disks/. Does not apply to Ultra disks.

fields.name: TimeCreated
fields.description: The time when the disk was created.

fields.name: UniqueId
fields.description: Unique Guid identifying the resource.
